examples:
What did you have a problem with?: Credits

Describe your issue: I need someone to contact me asap <NUMBER>.  We are being charged and have no clue what for. Please credit back our $$ and cancel any subscription that is charging us. This was never authorized by us. Thank you
Andreza De Jesus

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am struggling to claim my free canva credit that i have earned by referring a friend. Please help!

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: What can the credit be used for? 
How can I tell who the credit is from to thank them/help using it?
Can they be used towards a months billing?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Be billed to high. Credit on account.
What was the problem you had ?: Credits Describe the problem: You will answer my questions.by which channel ???
What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: I CHANGED THE CREDIT CARD AND THE SYSTEM IS BLOCKED. I NEED IT TO BE RELEASED.

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I got a canva credit point through the "Earn Canva credits". and I can't us it Can you please explain to me how?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I my account is in the negative. I did not want canva. Will this charge be credited back?

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: using canva credits
Describe the problem: I signed up and you were charged 2 times .... and it says that I have 14 days to use it as a test. What was the problem you had ?: Credits
What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: I WAS CHARGED ON MY CREDIT CARD, BUT I DON'T KNOW WHAT I BUY? I BELIEVE IT WAS A MISUSE PURCHASE! I WANT TO BE BACK
What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: I referred two friends and I can't redeem my credits

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: Hi, I received an e-mail for a survey and it said everyone who completes it will receive a free month of canva pro and there would be a code at the end. I didn't see that after I completed it. It did give me a link to redeem $10 worth credits. Thanks.
What kind of problem ?: Explain your other Problem: I suggested canva to someone and the room is now in canva but I haven't received canva credits
What is the type of problem ?: Other Describe the problem: I referred the canva to a friend and did not earn my credits, I want my credit

Describe the issue: Hello 
I did not authorise the $5 purchase made to my account 
Can you please credit this amount 
Thank you

What was your problem ?: Credits Describe the problem: It is amazing. Nobody gives me an answer. I've been writing to you for more than a month to tell me where my credits are and the design I made, which is my company, and no one answers. No longer what to do ...

What kind of problem?: Other

Describe your issue: I am trying to claim my free canva credit but I don't know how.

What did you have a problem with?: Credits

Describe your issue: I am not aware if any current purchases. Please explain what you billed me for
